DOC.brief_summary: A Placebo Controlled Study Evaluating Efficacy , Safety Tolerability Medication Patients Major Depressive Disorder ( MDD )
DOC.brief_title: An 8 Week Study Of Depression In Adults Diagnosed With Major Depressive Disorder
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis Major Depressive Disorder ( MDD ) Duration current depressive episode 12 week 24 month Patients read write level sufficient provide sign consent If female , patient must practice acceptable method birth control Patients psychiatric disorder would affect patient 's response treatment Patients respond two adequate course antidepressant therapy Patients currently abuse illicit drug alcohol Patients currently receive psychotherapy Patients receive electroconvulsive therapy within 6 month prior screen Patients pregnant lactate
